## IStudio.selection property

The current selection, consisting of Sheets and Sheet Objects

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly selection: Array<ISheetObject<{}> | ISheet>;
```

## Example

Usage:

```ts
console.log(studio.selection) // => [ISheetObject, ISheet]
```
